title: GitHub Supply Chain Security Analysis Schema
description: Normalized data schema for supply chain security analysis of GitHub repositories

fields.name: repository_id
fields.description: Unique repository identifier (GitHub URL)

fields.name: repository_owner
fields.description: GitHub organization or user name

fields.name: repository_name
fields.description: Repository name without owner

fields.name: repository_name_with_owner
fields.description: Full repository path (owner/name)

fields.name: repository_url
fields.description: GitHub repository URL

fields.name: repository_description
fields.description: Repository description text

fields.name: repo_has_sbom_artifact
fields.description: Repository contains SBOM (Software Bill of Materials) files

fields.name: repo_has_signature_artifact
fields.description: Repository contains cryptographic signature files

fields.name: repo_has_attestation_artifact
fields.description: Repository contains attestation files

fields.name: repo_security_tools_json
fields.description: JSON array of detected security tools across the repository

fields.name: repo_security_tools_count
fields.description: Total count of unique security tool types

fields.name: workflow_count
fields.description: Total number of CI/CD workflow files

fields.name: workflow_names_json
fields.description: JSON array of workflow file names

fields.name: workflow_security_tools_json
fields.description: JSON array of security tools found in each workflow

fields.name: release_index
fields.description: Zero-based index of this release (0 = latest)

fields.name: release_tag_name
fields.description: Git tag name for this release

fields.name: release_name
fields.description: Display name of the release

fields.name: release_created_at
fields.description: ISO timestamp of release creation

fields.name: release_artifact_count
fields.description: Total number of artifacts in this release

fields.name: release_has_container_images
fields.description: Release contains container images

fields.name: release_has_slsa_provenance
fields.description: Release contains SLSA provenance documents

fields.name: release_has_in_toto_attestation
fields.description: Release contains in-toto attestations

fields.name: release_sbom_formats_json
fields.description: JSON array of SBOM formats found in release

fields.name: artifact_index
fields.description: Zero-based index of this artifact within the release

fields.name: artifact_name
fields.description: Filename of the artifact

fields.name: artifact_download_url
fields.description: Direct download URL for the artifact

fields.name: artifact_size_hint
fields.description: Estimated size of the artifact

fields.name: artifact_file_extension
fields.description: File extension extracted from artifact name

fields.name: artifact_is_sbom
fields.description: This artifact is an SBOM file

fields.name: artifact_is_signature
fields.description: This artifact is a cryptographic signature

fields.name: artifact_is_attestation
fields.description: This artifact is an attestation document

fields.name: artifact_sbom_format
fields.description: Specific SBOM format if this is an SBOM file

fields.name: artifact_is_vex
fields.description: This artifact is a VEX (Vulnerability Exchange) document

fields.name: artifact_is_slsa_provenance
fields.description: This artifact contains SLSA provenance information

fields.name: artifact_is_in_toto_link
fields.description: This artifact is an in-toto link metadata file

fields.name: artifact_is_container_attestation
fields.description: This artifact is a container attestation

fields.name: artifact_type
fields.description: Classified type of artifact (signature, sbom, etc.)

fields.name: artifact_platform_hint
fields.description: Detected platform/architecture hints
